justification: Claims B has a TE weakness, but B already has a Tier 2 TE. B values workhorse RBs and consistency; trading away Ryan Taylor (workhorse) for Justin Garcia (committee) plus a questionable WR conflicts with B’s stated preferences and injury caution. Mason Mitchell isn’t a possession WR. The rationale notes byes and volatility and distinguishes A’s ceiling chasing, but misses key B motivations and fit. Overall, low alignment and thin justification.
